00006 /*
00007  * List of principals from our keytab that we
00008  * may try to get credentials for
00009  */
00010 struct gssd_k5_kt_princ {
00011         struct gssd_k5_kt_princ *next;
00012         krb5_principal princ;
00013         unsigned int    fl_root:1,
00014                         fl_mds:1;
00015         char *ccname;
00016         char *realm;
00017         krb5_timestamp endtime;
00018 };
